entry.title: Blvck Monogram MacBook Skin
entry.summary:
Vendor: Blvck Paris
Type: High-Tech
Price: 60.00

With the Blvck Monogram MacBook Skin, your device will never look the same. Made from premium materials, and laser cut to offer the best fit the Blvck MacBook Skin adds a touch of elegance to an otherwise generic design.

Upgrade your lifestyle today and wrap your MacBook in our luxurious Blvck MacBook Skin! 

Please note that this is a skin that you apply as a sticker to your MacBook (not a case) and that a spacing of 1-2mm may be visible on the edges once applied.

Package Included
-One top body skin Cover
-One keyboard/trackpad surround cover
-One bottom skin Cover

entry.title: Blvck Coffee Cup
entry.summary:
Vendor: Blvck Paris
Type: Accessories
Price: 60.00

 Indulge in an exclusive expression of the 'All Black' lifestyle with the latest arrival of the Blvck Coffee Cup. Get a taste of superior elegance while sipping your favorite beverage from this impeccable, all-black mug crafted with you in mind. This modern tumbler sports insulated stainless steel construction to keep your drinks piping hot or icy cold for up to 24 hours. Bye-bye to mundane mugs; arrive to that next level of the Blvck lifestyle.

Product Detail

Made from premium stainless steel and coated in our beautiful, soft-touch, matte black finish.
500ML

The limited festive edition of the 'Blvck Evil Teddy Christmas Keyring' ensures that you can bring a piece of luxury wherever you go. Crafted from the softest 100% cotton, its branded black hoodie and elegant details bring out its stylish 'All Black' look. An ideal gift, or a keepsake to be treasured, this plush and charming keyring is sure to please all who are searching for a chic and fashionable accessory.

Small Blvck Teddy Bear is 4inch/10cm high. The product is handmade and size may slightly vary.

entry.title: 'Blvck x Keith Haring' Notebook
entry.summary:
Vendor: Blvck Paris
Type: Accessories
Price: 50.00

 Step up your note-taking game with the luxe 'Blvck x Keith Haring' Notebook.

Crafted with a knock-out hardback design and soft-touch, matte black finish, this notebook will be the envy of everyone.

The front cover features a popular image by Keith Haring with a mesmerizing rainbow finish.

You'll find 128 blank pages (80gsm paper) inside with a built-in silk bookmark for effortless page-flipping. We've even thrown in our premium 'Silver Gel Pen' and 'Gold Gel Pen' so you can get started right away. -

Blvck A5 Notebook: 128 Pages & Size: A5 format

With this notebook, taking notes, creating art, or drawing will be a luxurious treat for your hands.

© Keith Haring Foundation. Licensed by Artestar, New York.

entry.title: Blvck Canva
entry.summary:
Vendor: Blvck Paris
Type: Accessories
Price: 700.00 - 750.00 (3 variants)

As part of the Blvck Art Deco collection, Blvck has collaborated with French artist SylGan to introduce the 'Blvck Canva' series. The piece comes with a Certificate of Authenticity and a serial number. 

Each piece will be made upon customer order and can be personalised upon request. The canva will be delivered within 3-4 weeks of the order being confirmed. 

Specifics:

- For the Skull: Size(cm): 50(L) 70(H) 

- For the Violin: Size(cm): 40(L) 50(H) 

- White Acrylic glue on panel and black acrylic spray.

Please note that due to the bespoke nature of the product, it is not available for return.  

About The Artist

Gan was born in Paris and now resides in Marbella, Spain. She came from a family of artists. As an artist painter-sculptor, musician, writer and being creative since her youth Gan knew how to create her own visual vocabulary.

Exhibited in Paris where Gan received the Medal of The City in Paris. Gan has also exhibited her work in The Contemporary Art Museum in the City of Fontainebleau, at Art Expo New York, Art Fair Marbella and more recently in Centro Cultural de San Pedro de Alcantara and The Museum Cortijo Miraflores where her paintings and extraordinary sculptures were highly acclaimed. Gan's works are held in many private collections throughout Europe.

entry.title: Blvck Cookbook
entry.summary:
Vendor: Blvck Paris
Type: Lifestyle
Price: 100.00

Introducing our first edition of the Blvck Cookbook, exploring different dishes, curated from different chefs around the world.

Mouthwatering, visually aesthetic, and tasty, this book contains around 40 recipes ranging from your favorite cocktails, appetisers, desserts and meals. 

Get creative, have fun exploring your favorite dishes with a touch of black.

The book also makes a great collectible as a coffee book for your living room or your kitchen.

entry.title: Blvck 'Monogram' Barrel
entry.summary:
Vendor: Blvck Paris
Type: Lifestyle
Price: 2500.00

As part of the Blvck Art Deco Collection, the Blvck 'Monogram' Barrel is a special 1 of 25 limited edition art deco pieces. The Blvck 'Monogram' barrel is the perfect luxury and minimalistic touch, complimenting your aesthetic home or office. 

The Blvck Art Deco collection is hand made at a bespoke atelier in France. This piece comes with a Certificate of Authenticity and a serial number. 

Each of the 25 pieces will be made upon customer order and can be personalised upon request. The barrel will be delivered within 3-4 weeks of the order being confirmed. 

Specifics:

- Size(cm): 57(L) 57(W) 89(H)

- Weight: 14kg

- The piece cannot be displayed outdoors.

Please note that due to the bespoke nature of the product, it is not available for return.

The Blvck Art Deco collection is hand made at a bespoke atelier in France. This piece comes with a Certificate of Authenticity and a serial number.
